name: Quick and Easy Pizza Burgers
author: Josie
summary: Quick, easy and good! These freeze well too.
ingredients: 1 pound American cheese, cut into pieces
8  hamburger buns, split, or as desired
directions: Heat a large skillet over medium-high heat
Cook and stir beef in the hot skillet until browned and crumbly, 5 to 7 minutes; drain and discard grease
Let ground beef cool until easily handled
Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C)
Process ham and American cheese in a food processor until finely chopped
Mix ground beef, ham and American cheese, pizza sauce, and oregano together in a large bowl
Spread mixture onto the bottom half of each hamburger bun and place the tops over the filling
Arrange hamburgers on a baking sheet
Bake in the preheated oven until cheese is melted in the burgers and buns are lightly browned, 15 to 20 minutes
